name: AntV Chart Server
description: Visualization MCP server with 26 chart types using AntV for chart generation and data analysis

tools.name: generate_area_chart
tools.description: Generate area charts for showing trends over continuous data

tools.name: generate_bar_chart
tools.description: Generate horizontal bar charts for comparing categories

tools.name: generate_boxplot_chart
tools.description: Generate box-and-whisker plots for statistical distributions

tools.name: generate_column_chart
tools.description: Generate vertical column charts for comparing categories

tools.name: generate_district_map
tools.description: Generate district map visualizations (China regions)

tools.name: generate_dual_axes_chart
tools.description: Generate dual-axes charts for comparing different scales

tools.name: generate_fishbone_diagram
tools.description: Generate fishbone diagrams for cause-and-effect analysis

tools.name: generate_flow_diagram
tools.description: Generate flow diagrams for process visualization

tools.name: generate_funnel_chart
tools.description: Generate funnel charts for conversion or stage analysis

tools.name: generate_histogram_chart
tools.description: Generate histograms for frequency distributions

tools.name: generate_line_chart
tools.description: Generate line charts for trend analysis

tools.name: generate_liquid_chart
tools.description: Generate liquid/fill gauges for percentage displays

tools.name: generate_mind_map
tools.description: Generate mind maps for hierarchical idea organization

tools.name: generate_network_graph
tools.description: Generate network graphs for relationship visualization

tools.name: generate_organization_chart
tools.description: Generate org charts for hierarchical structures

tools.name: generate_path_map
tools.description: Generate path maps for route visualization (China)

tools.name: generate_pie_chart
tools.description: Generate pie charts for part-to-whole relationships

tools.name: generate_pin_map
tools.description: Generate pin maps for location markers (China)

tools.name: generate_radar_chart
tools.description: Generate radar/spider charts for multivariate comparison

tools.name: generate_sankey_chart
tools.description: Generate sankey diagrams for flow quantities

tools.name: generate_scatter_chart
tools.description: Generate scatter plots for correlation analysis

tools.name: generate_treemap_chart
tools.description: Generate treemaps for hierarchical data proportions

tools.name: generate_venn_chart
tools.description: Generate venn diagrams for set relationships

tools.name: generate_violin_chart
tools.description: Generate violin plots for distribution comparison

tools.name: generate_waterfall_chart
tools.description: Generate waterfall charts for cumulative effect analysis

tools.name: generate_word_cloud_chart
tools.description: Generate word clouds for text frequency visualization
